reviewText: Perfect just as described I don't know what else to say but thanks I couldn't be more happy thanks a lot
Another good compilation to add to my odd collection of DVD's.  I am a fan of the rather hairy Earl Owensby.  Just a fun werewolf movie to add to my collection
They are some movies I had never seen.  I like collecting movies not too many people have seen.  The oldies I find are quite often better then what are called movies today.
Some stories hold interest; some do not

Omg these DVDs are just Aweful!!  These are the worst of the worst. Bad acting and terrible werewolf makeup job. It is so laughable.  If u can sit through the first 30 minutes of them your lucky. Within the first 5 minutes you can tell the movies stink!
Barely Wolves.. couple foreign films rest made for TV movies 1 of which wasn't even a Werewolf movie wouldn't spend the asking price for this "collection."
One or two films could've been A lot better especially when there is not one the special effects where alright the cast same each film set in A different time and place.
Very nostalgic viewing for those who remember 70's tv.  There were 4 movies.  Two were great and two were awful.  The discs were in extremely good condition.
My younger brother is a horror movie hound, so this was one film he picked out for himself and he watches it regularly.

This is a great set of so bad they are good horror flicks. When I need to get away from social message movies, I turn to these. This set of movies are for those looking for some relaxing fun, a good time and a good laugh...so curl up with a bowl pf popcorn and enjoy!
